content: the pine forest headband features a lace motif flanked by mirrored cables on a reverse stockinette background the pattern is a 12-row repeat the headband is knitted flat and the shorter edges are sewn together forming a twist and hiding the seam the i-cord edges give the headband a finished look and prevent the side edges from curling finished measurements - width 12 cm 4 75″ wide - circumference 50cm 19 75″
